opinion.case_name: Sage Hospitality Resources, LLC v. Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees Union, Local 57

opinion:
544 U.S. 1010

SAGE HOSPITALITY RESOURCES, LLC
v.
HOTEL EMPLOYEES AND RESTAURANT EMPLOYEES UNION, LOCAL 57.

No. 04-1216.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 25, 2005.

1

C. A. 3d Cir. Motions of National Right to Work Legal Defense Foundation et al. and Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America et al. for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 390 F. 3d 206.
